div.p: Invalid date-time. The value specified must meet the Date and Time specifications as defined by RFC822, with the exception that the year SHOULD be expressed as four digits.

ul.li: RFC 822 § 3.4.2: Exactly ONE SPACE should be used in place of arbitrary linear-white-space and comment sequences.
RFC 1123 § 5.2.14:: the military time zones are specified incorrectly in RFC-822: they count the wrong way from UT (the signs are reversed). As such, they shoud be avoided.
